product_name: adidas Terrex GORE-TEX Active Shell Jacket - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Built for the fastest athletes on the mountain, the light and packable adidas Terrex GORE-TEX(R) Active Shell Jacket offers breathable waterproof protection with soft, next-to-skin comfort. Constructed with excellent breathability for aerobic activities, GORE-TEX Active Shell 3-layer waterproof, breathable membrane will keep you dry in severe weather. Formotion(TM) fit is designed to move with you when you're hiking for excellent freedom of movement. Adjustable hood provides additional protection from the elements. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Overstock.
short_description: Built for the fastest athletes on the mountain, the light and packable adidas Terrex GORE-TEX(R) Active Shell Jacket offers breathable waterproof protection with soft, next-to-skin comfort.
